bibl.title: A Newly Discovered Manuscript of Luke's Gospel .
New Testament Manuscripts. Their Texts and Their World
bibl.author: HEAD, Peter M.

bibl.note: Fragments included in a collection of small pieces of vellum purchased early in 2003 by a private collector from a London dealer. Luke 5:23-24, 5:30-31, 7:9, 7:17-18. Provenance unknown, second half of the fifth century. - See in part pp. 109-112: codices [from Egypt] made up of small pages.
bibl.seg: HEAD Peter M., A Newly Discovered Manuscript of Luke's Gospel (de Hamel MS 386, Gregory-Aland 0312).
Thomas J. KRAUS and Tobias NICKLAS (Edd.), New Testament Manuscripts. Their Texts and Their World = Texts and Editions for New Testament Study. 2 (Leiden - Boston, 2006) pp. 105-120, 1 tabl.
